product_name: Surftech Bark Competitor AST Stand Up Paddle Board - 12' 6"
long_description: Extremely durable without sacrificing performance, this sleek racing paddle board has a displacement hull that cuts through waves and chop, allowing you put some distance on the competition.
short_description: Extremely durable without sacrificing performance, this sleek racing paddle board has a displacement hull that cuts through waves and chop, allowing you put some distance on the competition.
